Module com.alike
Package com.alike.solution_helpers

Class Permuter<T>

java.lang.Object
com.alike.solution_helpers.Permuter<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The object type in the list that will be permuted.
public class Permuter<T> extends Object
This class is used to calculate and manage the permutations of a list object.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Permuter(List<T> inputArray)
    Constructs a new Permuter object and calculates all the permutations.

    • Permuter

      public Permuter(List<T> inputArray)
      Constructs a new Permuter object and calculates all the permutations.
      Parameters:
      inputArray - The list of which we wish to find the permutations of.

  • Method Details

    • getNextPermutation

      public List<T> getNextPermutation() throws PermutationExhaustionException
      Returns the next permutation in the list of permutations.
      Returns:
      nextPerm The next permutation in the list of permutations.
      Throws:
      PermutationExhaustionException - Thrown if we exhaust the permutations in the list.

    • getCurrentPermutation

      public List<T> getCurrentPermutation() throws PermutationFocusException
      Returns the permutation that is currently being viewed.
      Returns:
      perm The permutation that is currently being viewed.
      Throws:
      PermutationFocusException - Thrown if the method is called when no permutation is being viewed.
